CustomField.description: Note that any issues with financial management should be included in the financial section of the risk assessment. Here, the focus is on the request budget. Yes (2): Proposed budget matches planned effort and resources needed to implement the proposed work and achieve desired impact Somewhat (1): Most elements of proposed work necessary to achieve desired impact is present in the budget Not reasonable (0): Unclear how budget connects to planned activities
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Is the budget linked to the proposed request and costs realistic and reasonable?
CustomField.label: Budget assess
